phrase.text: Why have the Numidians attacked us?! Report!
Carthage has allied with Syphax, the Numidian king, who assembled a great force to oppose us. Now they are waiting for the Iberian reinforcements to arrive to destroy us.
However, there is a renegade Numidian prince who is keeping them from directing all their attention to us.\n\nHe's called Masinissa and has a camp north of here.
Wait for me here! I shall meet Masinissa alone!\nLet's see if I could make the Numidians join our side.
